docs.title: GPU Capacity Up 40% for Inference
docs.snippet: Vendors confirm expanded GPU fleets to support the surge in inference workloads, reducing queue times for production rollouts.

docs.title: Hyperscalers Add Multimodal SKUs
docs.snippet: Clouds introduce specialised SKUs for multimodal assistants, with memory and throughput tuned for image+text pipelines.

docs.title: Retail Agents Drive Bursty Demand
docs.snippet: Campaign-driven usage spikes push providers to implement rapid scale-up/scale-down policies to meet seasonal load safely.

docs.title: Finance Pilots Move to Prod
docs.snippet: Select pilots graduate to production after passing evaluation gates, increasing steady-state demand on inference infrastructure.

docs.title: Visibility into GPU Backlogs Improves
docs.snippet: Procurement teams report better visibility across suppliers, enabling earlier reservations and smoother capacity planning.

docs.title: Registry Proposal Signals Compliance Push
docs.snippet: Regulatory pushes for documentation indirectly accelerate infrastructure investments to guarantee traceability and uptime.
